Topic.Title: How to set response to 'Talk to'?

Posts.EditableText: I understand how to program responses if a character is asked about a particular topic/word, but how do I change or add a response for when the player just types 'talk to X'?
Posts.HTML: I understand how to program responses if a character is asked about a particular topic/word, but how do I change or add a response for when the player just types 'talk to X'?

Posts.EditableText: Go to the Verbs tab, click Add, and when you start to type "talk" a SPEAK TO option should appear, and you can select that.
Posts.HTML: Go to the Verbs tab, click Add, and when you start to type "talk" a SPEAK TO option should appear, and you can select that.
